Unlocks building the Forbidden Palace.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Patronage tree will cause all [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Allied[ENDCOLOR] City-States to occasionally gift you [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People.
